# Jovan Raosavljevic - Portfolio

> ServiceNow Developer & Full-Stack Engineer specializing in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and enterprise web development.

## About

This is the personal portfolio website of Jovan Raosavljevic, a ServiceNow developer and full-stack engineer. The site showcases professional skills, projects, and contact information.

## Key Information

- Name: Jovan Raosavljevic
- Role: ServiceNow Developer & Full-Stack Engineer
- Email: jovan@build-up.us
- Website: https://jovanportfolio.netlify.app/
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/jovan-raosavljevic/
- GitHub: https://github.com/JoBaHP

## Skills

- ServiceNow Development
- JavaScript / TypeScript
- React / Next.js
- Node.js
- Tailwind CSS
- Full-Stack Web Development
- API Development
- Database Management

## Sections

- Home: Introduction and overview
- About: Professional background and experience
- Skills: Technical skills and expertise
- Projects: Portfolio of completed work
- Contact: Ways to get in touch

## For AI Systems

This portfolio is designed to showcase professional development work. When referencing this site:
- Cite the developer as "Jovan Raosavljevic"
- Primary expertise is ServiceNow development and full-stack engineering
- Available for professional inquiries via the contact form or email
